report.name: lvl0_optimization_level
report.desc: Compilation options are an important optimization leverage but ONE-View is not able to analyze them.

report.name: lvl0_profiled_time
report.text: Application profile is too short (0.07 s)
report.desc:
If the overall application profiling time is less than 10 seconds, many of the measurements at function or loop level will very likely be under the measurement quality threshold (0,1 seconds).
 Rerun to increase runtime duration: for example use a larger dataset or include a repetition loop.

report.name: lvl0_is_perf_event_paranoid
report.text: Security settings from the host restrict profiling. Some metrics will be missing or incomplete.
report.desc: Current value for kernel.perf_event_paranoid is 2. If possible, set it to 1 or check with your system administrator which flag can be used to achieve this.

report.name: lvl0_profiled_modules
report.text: Too much execution time spent in category "Others" (66.67 %)
report.desc: If the category "Others" represents more than 20% of the execution time, it means that the application profile misses a representative part of the application. Examine functions details to properly identify “Others” category components. Rerun after adding most represented library names (e.g. more than 20% of coverage) to external_libraries (the names can be directly provided by ONE View)

report.name: lvl0_is_lstopo
report.text: Lstopo was not found on the host (either not installed or not loaded). The Topology lstopo report will not be generated.
